scripts.docker:build: gcloud docker -- build -t gcr.io/$(gcloud config list project --format 'value(core.project)' 2> /dev/null)/$(node -e 'var p=require("./package.json");console.log(`${p.name}:${p.version}`)') .
scripts.docker:push: gcloud docker -- push gcr.io/$(gcloud config list project --format 'value(core.project)' 2> /dev/null)/$(node -e 'var p=require("./package.json");console.log(`${p.name}:${p.version}`)')
scripts.version: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:push
